analysis.description:
Reentrancy in UAPCrowdsale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#464-474):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(tokenWallet,tokensToSell) (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#468-469)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#469-472)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#472-473)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalised (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#473)

UAPCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#442-464) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#460-463)

UAPCrowdsale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#464-474) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(tokenWallet,tokensToSell) (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#468-469)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#469-472)
UAPToken.initialSuppy should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#346-347)
BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#87-95) should be declared external

UAPCrowdsale.setMainSaleDates (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol#479-489) should be declared external

UAPCrowdsale.fetchFunds (/unique_chucks/5/0x00fbe7398d9f0d53fbaef6e2f4c6ab0e7c31f5d7.sol) should be declared external
